title: S7E21 – "Sinister Sights" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Ryan Peacock, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about macabre meetings, small-town tragedies, ghostly guests, and local legends.
